column20:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Every Indian woman needs to have a pure silk traditional saree in her wardrobe. Drape this Vivikta beauty and watch yourself become the cynosure of all eyes. Best styled with strappy stilettos and a heavy gold jewellery set for a truly luxurious look.

  • Product Details

  • Green and blue traditional saree in a jacquard weave and contrast zari border
    Comes with a blouse piece
    The model is wearing a blouse from our stylist's collection
